entity.name: DataTransfer
entity.query: SELECT i.ID, sm.Specimen_Collection_Date, sm.Specimen_Collection_Location_Longitude, sm.Specimen_Collection_Location_Latitude ,i.Gene_Symbol, sm.Specimen_Collection_Location_Country,sm.Specimen_Collection_Location FROM Identity i, Identity_Sequence ids, Identity_Assembly ida,Assemly ass, Sample_Metadata sm WHERE i.ID=ids.Identity_ID and ids.ID=ida.Identity_Sequence_ID and ida.Assemly_ID=ass.ID and sm.ID=ass.Sample_Metadata_ID
